author: liyin
msg: [master] GC disabled L2 cache and reset some stat counters

Summary: During the testing of disabling the L2 cache I forgot to check if the memory allocated to the L2 cache is properly released to the OS, allowing it to be reused as FS cache and continue running in a known state. This diff properly releases the memory used by the L2 cache and resets some of the metrics to reflect this.

Test Plan: Built and deployed a jar to hbase481.frc3. While running with L2 cache enabled the resident memory is ~32GB. After disabling the cache the rresident memory drops to ~24GB and ODS graphs reflect this change properly.

author: liyin
msg: Summary: Fixing the NPE in HRegion.getHistogram().

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-8805] Add online configeration supporting and corresponding testcases
Summary: HRegion implements ConfigurationObserver, register/deregister from HRegionServer.configurationManager, testcases

author: liyin
msg: Summary: This diff allows the L2 cache to be disabled or L2 cache policies to be modified without restarting the RS. This is a preliminary diff to get some eyes on as I am not fully done testing.

author: tveronezi
msg: Retry connection after 10 seconds in case of failure.
Slow machines (like mine. :) ) may not have a chance to startup derby before que connection request.
